Card Text: Whenever this kills a unit, you may put a unit from your hand onto the battlefield.
Destroy target unit that attacks in all directions
Return target unit to its owner's hand.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt during your opponent's next combat step.
Shift all units to the chosen side of the board.
All units deal their attack damage to themselves.
Deal 2 damage to all units in a chosen 2x2 area.
Deal 3 damage to target unit. If there is a unit adjacent to the target that an opponent controls that wasn't targeted by this card already, repeat this process with it as the new target.
Target unit deals damage to all units adjacent to it.
All units take damage equal to 5 minus the number of attack directions they have.
